text: I'll join at Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT) as an Assistant Professor at this Fall!
Our paper 'A First Look at Certification Authority Authorization (CAA)' is accepted at ACM CCR!
Our article summarizing DNSSEC papers now appears in USENIX ;login: magazine.
I wrote a guest blog post for APNIC about registrar's roles in DNSSEC deployment study
I'm on the job market for a faculty position! Research/teaching statements are available upon the request.
Our paper won the Distinguished Paper Award at USENIX Security'17!
Our paper 'Privacy Leakage in Event-based Social Networks: A Meetup Case Study' is accepted at CSCW'18!
Our paper 'Understanding the Role of Registrars in DNSSEC Deployment' is accepted at IMC'17!
